description: Stylesheet defining layout and design for the Home component of the frontend application.

classes.name: .container
classes.description: Main container for the home component, centering content and setting background and padding.

classes.name: .header
classes.description: Styles for the header section, enabling a flexbox layout.

classes.name: .header-left
classes.description: Handle layout for the left part of the header.

classes.name: .logo
classes.description: Styles for the logo text, including fonts and colors.

classes.name: .subtitle
classes.description: Styles for the subtitle text under the logo.

classes.name: .profile-image
classes.description: Defines style for the profile image container including size and shape.
